http.title: 301 Moved Permanently
http.html:

The document has moved here.

data:

Date: Mon, 25 Feb 2019 03:33:11 GMT
Server: Apache
Location: https://www.hart.gov.uk/
Content-Length: 232
Content-Type: text/html; charset=iso-8859-1

Council Tax payers in Hart who receive a 25% reduction on their bill as single occupancy residents... Read more
